links.title: The 'Rolling Bear Market' Has Arrived: Morgan Stanley
links.description: Temper those lofty expectations, bulls. With once high growth sectors selling off of late -- see plunge in Micron ( MU) , the SOX Index, emerging markets and cryptocurrencies -- some on Wall Street are beginning to sound the alarm bell on the broader market for 2019.

messages.body: $AAPL Posting this because I love y’all. https://www.theverge.com/tldr/2017/12/28/16825336/apple-lawsuit-steve-jobs-trademark-logo-italian-brothers-barbato

links.title: 'Steve Jobs' is an Italian company - and Apple can't do anything about it
links.description: After years of legal battles, a pair of brothers - Vincenzo and Giacomo Barbato - have successfully managed to win a legal battle against Apple, earning the right to call their company " Steve Jobs," after Apple's iconic founder, according to la Repubblica Napoli .

links.title: AAPL closes within prior day's range
links.description: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Technical Analysis Report for Oct 08, 2018 Highlights Overview Moving lower for the 3rd day in a row, AAPL ended Monday at 223.77 edging lower $0.52 (-0.23%), but still slightly outperforming the market (Nasdaq 100, -0.62%). Today's close at 223.77 marks the lowest recorded closing price since September 26th.
